transcript: Leila is a machine she can do the same thing forever I want to myself by doing the same thing forever but to achieve something big you have to do the same thing forever and so I try and think macro micro so macro I'm not changing the strategy I want to build this big thing micro my daytoday I try and find aspects or components to the business that I can scratch my creative itch I can look at new content Styles look at New Media platforms I can make new lead magers I can lock myself in make something amazing then I can give that away and so rather than trying to create new products and new businesses I'm taking all of my entrepreneurial Juju and my Creative Energy and putting it to somewhere where it actually benefits from Innovation and creativity on a consistent basis
